description: |-
  Validate that a string is a valid TCP/UDP port number (1..65535).
---

# function: port_number

Returns true when the input string represents an integer between 1 and 65535.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  ports = ["80", "443", "65535"]
}

output "port_number_example" {
  value = [
    for p in local.ports : {
      port  = p
      valid = provider::validatefx::port_number(p)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
port_number(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
